name: Space Cowboy
description:
Space Cowboy is the forthcoming game from Torchlight Studio. Based upon the retro topdown space shooters of yesteryear but with a more polished look and smoother game play.

​Soon to be available on PC via Steam.

​Space Cowboy features a single player campaign to battle alien foes at high speeds. The rule is simple, SURVIVE. You only have ONE life!. Defeat waves of alien invaders using what power ups you can while dodging space debris and be hailed as the hero of Earth.

Or face off against an endless horde of aliens in survival mode and see how long you can last
